(Extn;: 2223 2318 2468 2653 (Ministry of 8hipping, Road Transport and Highways) 0-5 W4 6, #42r-10, #Trt, # frr-110 075 0-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delh+-1100075 NoNHAIICMCIEPOL 27,07 , 2011 POLICYMATTER TECH: (84p041) Sub: Standard Sub- Criteria for evaluation of RFP proposal for Appointment of Independent Engineer for DBFOT Froject of NHAI- Corrigendun reg The Following amendment is made for Standard Sub-Criteria for evaluation of RFP proposal for Appointment of Independent Engineer for DBFOT Projects of NHAI issued vide Circtlar Policy Matter: Tech 82/2011 dated 5/7/2011, At page 1 entries at S.No 3 be read as Numbers of personnel with the firim more than one year with Jthe firm: 2 20 personnel marks 2I to 30 Linearly varying from 0.2 to 2 30 personnel 2 marks in place of [umbers of personnel with the firm more than one year with #he firm; 3 K20 personnel 0 marks p1 to 30 Linearly varying from 03 to 3 30 personnel . 3 marks contd ,.2 key - key "
